title: Himi 113
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
Ko eni kuo u lava’i,
‘A e tu’unga totonu;
Ke tau ki ai hono taula,
‘A hoku laumālie ni;
Ko e pekia ‘a Sīsū,
‘I he’eku angahala.
2.
Ko e tu’unga ko eni,
Na’e tu’utu’uni ia;
‘I he te’eki fakatupu
‘A māmani ‘i lalo ni,
Pea ‘e tu’u ‘o ‘auha,
‘A e langi mo māmani.
3.
‘E Tamai, ko ho’o ‘ofa
Ki he kakai angahala;
Ko e me’a lahi hake,
‘I he’emau fa’a mahalo;
‘Oku kei mafao atu
‘A ho nima ‘i he ‘ofa.
4.
Ko e kakai angahala,
‘Oku nau toe tafoki
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona,
Ke nau ma’u ai ‘a e mo’ui;
‘E ‘ikai te ke li’aki,
Ka ke ma’u ‘akinautolu. *
